story_26_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: So, what do you think? Was that a good battle?
story_26_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: I was hoping for someone a little stronger.
story_26_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Th-that’s strange. The machine should be
working normally.
story_26_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Maybe it just needed some time to warm up. Let’s
fire it up again!
story_26_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Not to worry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m sure the next sync pair the machine calls over
will be a strong one! Just watch!
story_26_04000/2401_0401_1100_10:
Spoken like a true inventor—never backing down
in the face of setbacks! Fantastic!
story_26_04000/2401_0402_1300_10:
Hmm. But we made all the necessary adjustments
to be sure it works before you all got here...
story_26_04000/2401_0402_1400_10:
Then I’m sure it’ll work just fine now! Let’s give it
another go!
story_26_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
All right. This time, I’ll make some adjustments so
the machine scans for the strongest sync pair in
the area!
story_26_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: The future is now, thanks to science!
story_26_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Hold on. If you set it to only target the strongest
sync pair, won’t that just bring one super strong
sync pair here?
story_26_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Oh, you’re right. It’d be better if we could get
three to come so we can have a team battle.
story_26_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
A mob of sync pairs is rushing this way as
we speak!
